subject: Skiing
Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Bobsledding
Skeleton (Sport)
lead_paragraph: Marcel Hirscher of Austria skied out for the first time in three seasons allowing Neureuther to clinch a victory in Wengen, Switzerland, and retake the standings lead.
snippet: Marcel Hirscher of Austria skied out for the first time in three seasons allowing Neureuther to clinch a victory in Wengen, Switzerland, and retake the standings lead.
